Transformable
public class GraphConnector
extends DfsTraversal
implements Transformable

Makes a graph connected by adding edges between its components.

execute

public java.lang.Object execute(Graph pGraph,
                                Vertex pVxStart)
Starts the traversal of the graph starting with vertex pVxStart.

Overrides:
execute in class GraphTraversal
Parameters:
pGraph - Graph being traversed.
pVxStart - Vertex to start the traversal with.
Returns:
Returns the number of edges added to the graph.

transform

public int transform(Graph pGraph)
Transforms the input graph (e.g. by adding/removing edges) inplace, i.e. no copy of the graph will be made.

Specified by:
transform in interface Transformable
Parameters:
pGraph - Graph that will be transformed.
Returns:
Number of transformations made to the graph, in particular 0 is returned if no changes to the graph were made.
